clearNextHits() - Method in class model.Computer
Empties the list of the next Coordinates the Computer wants to hit.
clearShips() - Method in class model.Player
Removes all Player's Ships from its ships grid and initial ships grid.
COLUMNS - Static variable in class utils.Utility
 
Computer - Class in model
Class that represents the A.I.
Computer(int, ComputerType) - Constructor for class model.Computer
Constructor for the class Computer.
computerHits(PlayerState) - Method in class model.Computer
According to the Player's state, the Computer decides where to aim for its next hit.
ComputerType - Enum in utils
Utility Enum containing the two types of a Computer object.
controller - package controller

Controller for a CountdownPanel.

CountdownPanel - Class in view
Class that represents the timer for a timed Battleship match.

Constructor for the class CountdownPanel.
crossCheck(int, int) - Method in class model.Computer
Given a cell's coordinates, the Computer aims to the (at most) four cells vertically and horizontally surrounding the chosen cell.
